name: Under-Switch
description:
Dive into a cave system where you must complete changing puzzles with some similarities to escape!   

Push block, press buttons as roll blocks onto buttons to complete the levels where the end of one level leads to the beginning of a new one with a slight twist. 

Solve the Puzzles and use your knowledge of the last level(s)!

Controls: 

SPACE: to Jump

W/A OR LEFT AND RIGHT ARROWS KEYS: to move

R: to restart the level 

Controller support: in the main game however you will need to use your mouse within the menus. 

Theme - and other #brackey'sgamejam stuff:

This game was made for Brackey's game jam 2023.1.

Use of the theme: an end is a new beginning, the end of one level leads to a new level with a slight twist on the last level and the end of one speed-run leads to the beginning of a new one. 

Music was made in Soundtrap: https://www.soundtrap.com/ 

All art was created by myself.
